parsed_action.reasoning: With no recent events or demand data, run a simple price experiment while maintaining strong margins (cost $10). Use charm pricing and inventory-informed adjustments: increase Electronics to $21.99 to test margin tolerance at moderate stock; nudge Home Goods to $19.99 as a near-neutral control with psychological pricing; discount Apparel (highest inventory) to $18.49 to stimulate sell-through and gauge elasticity. Evaluate sales velocity next tick and iterate.
